promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple swan water-type pokemon with a white and black beak. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or swan. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Plumacrest, a a massive simple swan water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Seashell Attack. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "swan", "water" or "Plumacrest". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, swan-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This elegant maritime monarch is dominant in open-sea habitats. Its Seashell Attack skill leverages ocean treasures in battle.
